lines.text: A fallen horse near Piccadilly caused a terrible congestion. How the traffic will flow when it is all motorized.
With your ideas, I'm surprised you're shocked at the thought of war.
Not at all. It's purely a matter of business. How can we charge our sort of prices with everybody happily killing each other for a shilling a day?
Sir Ivan, if you please. Virtue, it seems, has been rewarded.
I thought this was a hotel!

[appalled by her outfit]
What on Earth?
For your lost principles, I presume?
